label: AllowanceCharge
comment: A component of pricing, such as a service, promotion, allowance or charge.

datatypeProperties.comment: The actual monetary value of the applied allowance charge.
The code specifying the type of this trade allowance charge.
The code specifying the reason for this trade allowance charge.
The code specifying the reason for this applied allowance charge.
The monetary value that is the basis on which the applied allowance charge is calculated.
The quantity on which this trade allowance charge is based.
The percentage applied to calculate this trade allowance charge.
The indication of whether or not the trade allowance charge is a charge.
The textual description of the applied allowance charge.
The unique identifier for this trade allowance charge.
The indication of whether or not this trade allowance charge is prepaid.
The reason, expressed as text, for this trade allowance charge.
The sequence number for applying this trade allowance charge.
The monetary value of the unit basis on which the allowance or charge is calculated.

objectProperties.comment: The actual trade currency exchange for this trade allowance charge.
The applied tax category of this applied allowance charge.
A tax category of this trade allowance charge.

referencedBy.comment: An allowance or charge applicable to this supply chain consignment.
An allowance or charge applied to the trade price.
Applied allowance charge information related to this calculated price.
